Texts.Eng:
A fractured race of sapient cats. Half are peace loving free-thinkers, while the rest are war-hungry monsters. 
  
 Diet: Omnivorous, can eat raw meat.
  
 ^orange;Perks^reset;:
 Very nimble. Gain ^green;20%^reset; Jump and ^green;8%^reset; Run Speed^reset;
 ^green;+20%^reset; Cold Resist, ^green;-50%^reset; Fall Damage
 Night Vision
 Tech: ^green;Veluu's Claws ^reset;
 Immune: Jungle Dirt and Mud
  
 ^orange;Environment^reset;: 
 ^green;+10%^reset; Health, ^green;+15%^reset; Energy on ^green;Jungle, Primeval, Forest, Rainforest, Desert^reset; biomes
    
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:
 Fists, Daggers, Shortswords: ^green;+1%^reset; Crit Chance
 Thrown Weapons/Grenades: ^green;+25%^reset; Dmg
 Magnorb: ^green;+2%^reset; Crit Chance
 Arm Cannon: ^green;+15%^reset; Protection,^green;+15%^reset; Damage 
 Bow: -^green;0.1^reset;s Draw Time
 
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
 Weak: ^red;20%^reset; Cosmic and Electric
